item.description:
I was selected as a WINNER of a Howl at the Moon After-Work Party!
Let's enjoy live entertainment, great food, and tons of fun which is described as a high-energy dueling pianos event that is one of the most high-energy nightlife experiences in the country.

Showtime is from 7 PM until 10 PM

If you RSVP Yes, are at least 21 and arrive between 6 PM and 8 PM you receive:


· No cover until 8 PM
if you leave and want to reenter after 8 PM you must pay a $7 entry fee and if you arrive after 8 PM you must pay a $7 entry fee.

· $3.25 vodka drinks (type of liquor to be named that night)

· $3.25 rum drinks (type of liquor to be named that night)

· $2.00 Beer (type of beer to be named that night)

· Complimentary buffet from 6 PM until 8 PM (so get there early so you can have some grub).

AS ALWAYS YOU MUST MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER


If you want to pay for your food and interested in the drink list here are the Howl Food Menu and Howl Drink Menu


Check out MBTA or Hop Stop to create your route by public transit. Aquarium (blue line), Haymarket (green & orange lines), State (orange & blue lines), Government Center (blue & green lines), and South Station (red line & commuter rail) subway stations are no more than a fifteen (15) minute walk away.


Howl at the Moon Party Terms and Conditions:

I understand that Howl at the Moon does not reserve or allow guests to hold tables. If you are interested in a guaranteed table, there is special party pricing.

I understand that these are the privileges for the date specified only. No rights, privileges or drink offers will apply to this Happy Hour Party other than what is stated in this email. I understand that I will be responsible to notify all my guests of their privileges prior to the party.
item.name: Let's Howl at the Moon
